tool.name: Stanford Coreference Resolver
tool.description: (standalone) Generates coreference information for unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates coreference annotations for a text in a LIF container using the `Stanford Core NLP tools <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/>`_.
**Required Annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document containing:
1. `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token>`_ annotations (with part of speech) #. `Coreference <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Coreference>`_ annotations #. `Markable <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Markable>`_ annotations
